body: I used that, because this case is extremely rare, and I don't want to have `PyObject_IsInstance` in the hot path of the arg parser, so I used a cheaper pointer comparison. I can change that to `THPVariable_Check` if you really want me to.
body_html: I used that, because this case is extremely rare, and I don't want to have PyObject_IsInstance in the hot path of the arg parser, so I used a cheaper pointer comparison. I can change that to THPVariable_Check if you really want me to.
